Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory748.jpg'}
{3: 'You sit at the front desk and take a sip of the recommended drink. The familiar flavor instantly fills your mouth.'}
{3: "You let out a long breath. It's amazing how authentic this tastes—you never expect the World Folklore Enthusiasts to capture New Oakley's style so perfectly."}
{1: '1', 3: 'You down the rest of your drink, pay your bill, and get ready to leave—when the door suddenly flies open with a bang. A red-haired Construct strides in, spots you, and dashes over.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'They tell me a commandant from Babylonia is here, and I just know it has to be you!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'How do you figure that out?', 3: '13', 4: "I'm just about to come find you.", 5: '13'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Stop talking—come on, I'm taking you to arm wrestle!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He says this, then grabs your hand and heads outside.'}
{2: 'Arm wrestling the moment we meet... is that really a local custom here?', 3: '20'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "It's not like it's any sort of custom... Wait...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Someone's already challenged you to arm-wrestle?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yeah, the moment I arrived, this really huge guy wanted to arm-wrestle me.', 3: '24'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Did you win?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I already said he's huge, so obviously I didn't.", 3: '26', 4: "I wasn't interested, so I just said no and left.", 5: '26', 6: 'Of course!', 7: '32'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "He's beaten me to it!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He slams on the table in frustration, causing the cups and bottles to jump one inch into the air.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Nice work! See? I keep telling you to train every day—look how useful it is now!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He slams on the table in excitement, causing the cups and bottles to jump one inch into the air.'}
{2: "So, what's going on here?", 3: '39'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Hey, isn't there some kind of Double Seventh Festival from Kowloong? I've done my homework, and they call it a Luck Duel!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "They say the luck part means good fortune, so in the Luck Duel, you compete to grab someone else's luck. If you win, you take it all!", 4: '1'}
{2: "This doesn't quite match what I remember...", 3: '43'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "I mean, no matter what it's like elsewhere, these are the rules here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'They draw lots to decide who arm-wrestles whom. The winner takes every ounce of "luck" from the loser. You have to go through with it—if you refuse, you lose by default.', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's a pretty intense way to do things...", 3: '46', 4: "I don't really feel anything.", 5: '46'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "You really don't know a thing? I figure you're here to try your luck like everyone else...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'So, what are you doing here then?', 4: '1'}
{2: "(Fill Noctis in on the WGAA's request)", 3: '50'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "It's a festival, and you're still on the job? Wow, you sure know how to run into all the bad luck.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'How are you supposed to fight with luck this bad? At least it\'s a holiday today—come on, let\'s go score some "luck"!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I see some Constructs getting in on the action as well.', 3: '54'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Oh right, if you go head-to-head with a Construct, you're basically doomed.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "One loss, and your luck's wiped clean. No way we're letting that happen...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis sits on a stool with his arms crossed and head bowed, muttering something no one can quite catch.'}
{3: 'Suddenly, his face brightens with excitement, and he jumps to his feet.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "I'm an absolute genius!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Don't worry about the details—just follow me!", 4: '1'}
{3: "He doesn't let you ask anything else. Noctis grabs your arm and rushes out of the shop."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory756.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Arm-Wrestling Opponent', 3: 'Argh—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arm-Wrestling Opponent', 3: 'Ah!!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "You can't even take one hit. Next!", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory757.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chickened Opponent', 3: 'No, I... uh...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "If you're brave enough, let's arm-wrestle. If not, give up and quit wasting my time!", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory748.jpg'}
{3: "You follow Noctis from the south side to the north, and by the time you get back to the bar, he's already beaten just about everyone around here."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Commandant, do you see how I\'m taking down every so-called unbeatable opponent out there? Right now, all the good fortune—every bit of "luck"—is on my side.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'So, moving on...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis seizes your hand and sits beside the wooden cabinet. He braces his left elbow on the tabletop, raises his forearm, and locks both of you into an arm-wrestling stance.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Now that you're here, I'm not letting you leave without beating you at least once.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'No way—this is impossible!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Noctis's hand flops to one side on the wooden counter, and you keep yours firmly pressed on top."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'How could someone as great as me lose to you?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "It must be because I've been arm-wrestling way too many people before this, so now my frame's in rough shape!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Whatever, I\'ll own up to my loss. All my "luck" now is...', 4: '1'}
{3: "You watch Noctis try so hard to fake that bitter look, and you can't stop a grin from creeping onto your face."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hey, why do you look so weird right now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Seriously... You've already caught on, haven't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: "You're such a terrible actor.", 3: '107', 4: 'Caught on to what?', 5: '107'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Stop! Stop laughing like that! Your laughter is making my whole body ache...', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Noctis', 3: "This idea doesn't come easy. Your luck is already pretty awful, and after everything that happens today, it only gets worse. I really don't want to hear about you getting whacked by a meteor the moment you walk out the door.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yeah, I know.', 3: '112', 4: "Come on, it's not that bad.", 5: '112'}
{2: 'But still... thanks.', 3: '113'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Haha, what's there to thank me for? It's just a few doses of good luck. They're all yours now!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Anyway, you beat me—so now you\'re the "luckiest" person around here, the one with all the good fortune.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Plenty of people must be keeping an eye on you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The red-haired Construct jumps up, planting a foot on the bench.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "But don't worry, Commandant. I'm staying by your side all day.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Nobody is taking away your good luck on my watch!', 4: '1'}
